homepage.text: Improve your resume with AI. Analyze, fix, and impress — instantly.

texts.1: Upload your CV or type it in the input field.

2.1: Pay $1 to analyze your resume. SmartCV will review grammar, structure, clarity, and formatting.
2.3: ✅ Checks for grammar and style errors – corrects language mistakes and weak phrasing.
2.4: 🧱 Evaluates structure and logic – makes sure the sections are well-organized and clear.
2.5: 💡 Gives professional improvement tips – what to add, fix, or remove.
2.6: 🔍 Analyzes relevance for the job market – checks how strong your resume is for your field.
2.7: ⭐ Gives a score from 1 to 10 – how strong your resume is overall.

texts.3: After analysis, pay an additional $1 to generate and download the improved resume in PDF or Word format.
texts.4: You can change languages ​​by switching the language in the upper right corner. (English and Russian only)
texts.5: All payments are one-time and secure. No subscriptions.
texts.6: In the Archive section, users can view and re-download all previously analyzed and improved resumes. It’s a personal history of all activity with SmartCV.

texts.2: 🎯 A fully formatted and improved CV
texts.3: 📝 With all grammar fixes, suggestions & enhancements
texts.4: 📂 Available for download in PDF 📄 or Word 🧾 format
